articles.title: First resident dies at Skye care home rocked by coronavirus outbreak - Daily Record
articles.description: 30 of the 34 residents there have tested positive for Covid-19 and 27 of the 52 staff members
articles.content:
The first death of a resident at a Skye care home rocked by a coronavirus outbreak has been announced. 
 The operators of the Home Farm care home in Portree, HC One, confirmed the death today.
